name: Slice (itch) (Dancing Monkeys)
description:
Warning: Disturbing Images and Flashing Lights

You wake up groggily in a dire situation. You're handcuffed to a bed in an empty room with only one means of escape: Cut the cellphone out from under the skin on your abdomen so you can call for help. 

Made for the 2 minute Horror Jam, but may be expanded upon pending reviews!
